   16: -module(mod_ping_SUITE).
   17: -compile(export_all).
   18: 
   19: -include_lib("escalus/include/escalus.hrl").
   20: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   21: 
   22: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   23: %% Suite configuration
   24: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   25: all() ->
   26:     [{group, client_ping},
   27:      {group, server_ping},
   28:      {group, server_ping_kill}].
   29: 
   30: groups() ->
   31:     [{client_ping, [], [ping]},
   32:      {server_ping, [], all_tests()},
   33:      {server_ping_kill, [], all_tests()}
   34:     ].
   35: 
   36: all_tests() ->
   37:     [ping,
   38:      active,
   39:      active_keep_alive,
   40:      server_ping_pong,
   41:      server_ping_pang].
   42: suite() ->
   43:     escalus:suite().
   44: 
   45: init_per_suite(Config) ->
   46:     escalus:init_per_suite(Config).
   47: 
   48: end_per_suite(Config) ->
   49:     escalus:end_per_suite(Config).
   50: 
   51: init_per_group(client_ping, Config) ->
   52:     start_mod_ping([]),
   53:     escalus:create_users(Config, escalus:get_users([alice]));
   54: init_per_group(server_ping, Config) ->
   55:     start_mod_ping([{send_pings, true},
   56:                     {ping_interval, 8},
   57:                     {ping_req_timeout, 4}]),
   58:     escalus:create_users(Config, escalus:get_users([alice]));
   59: init_per_group(server_ping_kill, Config) ->
   60:     start_mod_ping([{send_pings, true},
   61:                     {ping_interval, 8},
   62:                     {ping_req_timeout, 4},
   63:                     {timeout_action, kill}]),
   64:     [{timeout_action, kill} | escalus:create_users(Config, escalus:get_users([alice]))].
   65: 
   66: end_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
   67:     Domain = ct:get_config(ejabberd_domain),
   68:     dynamic_modules:stop(Domain, mod_ping),
   69:     escalus:delete_users(Config, escalus:get_users([alice])).
   70: 
   71: init_per_testcase(CaseName, Config) ->
   72:     escalus:init_per_testcase(CaseName, Config).
   73: 
   74: end_per_testcase(CaseName, Config) ->
   75:     escalus:end_per_testcase(CaseName, Config).
   76: 
   77: start_mod_ping(Opts) ->
   78:     Domain = ct:get_config(ejabberd_domain),
   79:     dynamic_modules:start(Domain, mod_ping, Opts).
   80: 
   81: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   82: %% Ping tests
   83: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   84: ping(Config) ->
   85:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}],
   86:         fun(Alice) ->
   87:                 Domain = ct:get_config(ejabberd_domain),
   88:                 PingReq = escalus_stanza:ping_request(Domain),
   89:                 escalus_client:send(Alice, PingReq),
   90: 
   91:                 PingResp = escalus_client:wait_for_stanza(Alice),
   92:                 escalus:assert(is_iq_result, [PingReq], PingResp)
   93:         end).
   94: 
   95: active(Config) ->
   96:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}],
   97:         fun(Alice) ->
   98:                 Domain = ct:get_config(ejabberd_domain),
   99:                 ct:sleep(timer:seconds(6)), % wait 6s (ping_interval is 8)
  100:                 escalus_client:send(Alice, escalus_stanza:ping_request(Domain)),
  101:                 escalus:assert(is_iq_result, escalus_client:wait_for_stanza(Alice)),
  102:                 ct:sleep(timer:seconds(4)), % wait another 4s and check if connection we got ping req
  103: 
  104:                 false = escalus_client:has_stanzas(Alice)
  105:         end).
  106: 
  107: active_keep_alive(Config) ->
  108:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}],
  109:         fun(Alice) ->
  110:                 Domain = ct:get_config(ejabberd_domain),
  111:                 ct:sleep(timer:seconds(6)), % wait 6s (ping_interval is 8)
  112:                 Socket = Alice#client.socket,
  113:                 gen_tcp:send(Socket, <<"\n">>),
  114:                 ct:sleep(timer:seconds(4)), % wait another 4s and check if connection we got ping req
  115: 
  116:                 false = escalus_client:has_stanzas(Alice)
  117:         end).
  118: 
  119: server_ping_pong(Config) ->
  120:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}],
  121:         fun(Alice) ->
  122:                 PingReq = wait_for_ping_req(Alice),
  123:                 Pong = escalus_stanza:iq_result(PingReq),
  124:                 escalus_client:send(Alice, Pong)
  125:         end).
  126: 
  127: server_ping_pang(ConfigIn) ->
  128:     Domain = ct:get_config(ejabberd_domain),
  129:     Metrics = [{[Domain, user_ping_timeout], 1}],
  130:     Config = [{mongoose_metrics, Metrics} | ConfigIn],
  131:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}],
  132:         fun(Alice) ->
  133:                 wait_for_ping_req(Alice),
  134:                 %% do not resp to ping req
  135:                 ct:sleep(timer:seconds(5)), %% server waits 4s for the reply
  136:                 TimeoutAction = ?config(timeout_action, Config),
  137:                 check_connection(TimeoutAction, Alice)
  138:         end).
  139: 
  140: check_connection(kill, Client) ->
  141:     false = escalus_connection:is_connected(Client);
  142: check_connection(_, Client) ->
  143:     true = escalus_connection:is_connected(Client).
  144: 
  145: wait_for_ping_req(Alice) ->
  146:     PingReq = escalus_client:wait_for_stanza(Alice, timer:seconds(10)),
  147:     escalus:assert(is_iq_get, PingReq),
  148:     <<"urn:xmpp:ping">> = exml_query:path(PingReq, [{element, <<"ping">>},
  149:                                                     {attr, <<"xmlns">>}]),
  150:     PingReq.
  151:
